title: r
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', '-Mountain Views', '-24-Hour Athletic Centers Featuring Cardio, Free Weights, and Yoga Room', '-Business Center with Workstations and WiFi', '-Two Outdoor Lounges with Fireplace', '-Close to the Las Vegas Strip', '-Covered Parking Available', '-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar', '-Regular Community Events with Friendly Staff', '-Elevator Access in Select Buildings', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Green Globes Certified', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
